properties.areaDesc: Southeast Warren; Northern Warren; Western Windham; Hamilton; Northern Saratoga; Bennington
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 3:29AM EST until January 26 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected including snow, sleet and
freezing rain. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one
half inch in lower elevations, and one to two inches across
higher elevations. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an
inch, except up to one quarter of an inch across higher
elevations of the southern Green Mountains. Winds gusting as
high as 35 mph across higher elevations.

* WHERE...Bennington and western Windham Counties in southern
Vermont. Hamilton, Warren, and northern Saratoga Counties in
eastern New York.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 4 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Untreated ground surfaces will become slippery. Plan
on slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges. Difficult travel
conditions expected. Isolated power outages are possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy ground conditions could linger a few
hours after temperatures rise above the freezing mark.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY
